pullRequest.title: Copy DeckID when copying/adding note
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose / Description
Reported in #6507  - Copy Note does not copy to the correct deck.
Fixes
Fixes #6507
Approach
Place the DeckId in the intent, and restore to this. mCurrentDid overrides anything set in the model in NoteEditor.setDid
How Has This Been Tested?
Tested on my phone, then added a unit test
Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

nodes.bodyText: same comment here re: the zero just to connect them - may be nothing but if it is something it's in two spots

commit.message:
Copy Deck Id when copying note

Note that a note does not have a Deck Id. The deck id is where cards go.

Fixes 6507
